import React from 'react' import logo from '../assets/img/RK logo.png' import { useState } from "react"; import '../css/index.css' export default function Header() { const [sideBar, setSideBar] = useState(false); const NavigationLink = [ { Title: "Home", Path: "/", }, { Title: "About Us", Path: "/abouts" }, { Title: "Sevices", Path: "/services" }, { Title: "Our Client", Path: "/clientreview" }, { Title: "Product", Path: "/product" }, { Title: "Contact", Path: "/contact" } ]; return ( <>
